function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate use of personal protective equipment (PPE) leading to increased transmission of COVID-19 in meatpacking plants.","Impact":"Higher incidence of COVID-19 among workers and potential spread to the wider community.","Mitigation":"Implementation of universal masking, physical barriers, ventilation enhancements, and worker education on proper mask use and adherence.","Technologies":"Masks, physical barriers, ventilation systems.","People":"Workers in meatpacking plants, community members near the plants.","Owner":"Managers of meatpacking plants, public health authorities."},{"Description":"Inadequate compliance with infection control processes in nursing homes leading to higher infection rates and mortality.","Impact":"Increased infections and mortality rates among residents and staff in nursing homes.","Mitigation":"Monitoring adherence to infection control processes, especially proper wearing of PPE and cohorting.","Technologies":"Monitoring systems, education programs on infection control, PPE.","People":"Residents and staff of nursing homes.","Owner":"Management of nursing homes, regulatory authorities."},{"Description":"Lack of staff compartmentalization and low-quality implementation of preventive measures leading to COVID-19 outbreaks in long-term care facilities (LTCFs).","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 outbreaks among residents and staff in LTCFs.","Mitigation":"Organizing staff compartmentalization within zones, and ensuring high-quality implementation of preventive measures.","Technologies":"Zoning systems, monitoring tools for preventive measures adherence.","People":"Residents and staff of LTCFs.","Owner":"Management of LTCFs, regulatory authorities."}]}
